title: DAN TSHANDA _SPLASH_8Albums_Drgon
description:
DAN TSHANDA is a household name in South Africa despite the fact that his albums all have similiar styles of instrumentation and arrangement. 

Surprisingly he is something of a demi-god amongst the Ndebele-speaking people of Zimbabwe. 

TshandaDan andwith his group Splash have released a new album, titled Crocodile, which is riding the crest of the airwaves. 

Bet you remember one of his hit songs, Peacock, which was kicking up a hectic dance storm it is also featured on the new album as a remix version. 

And off course you may have noticed that Patricia Majalisa, Dalom Kids and Matshikos have similar sounds: this is based on the fact that they are all under Dan's stable, Dalom Music Productions. 

Their brand of disco music with a little bit of R&B has been doing well in the market.
